column4: I've searched for more of one hour in the web, but I've not find anythings.
parallel port scanners are evil magic
what is "evil magic"?
Well, normally pretty hard to get to work reliably
Which package is it that is part of?
i've download the packages from the SANE site
Oh - why? Ubuntu has sane, and it seems to have the umax_pp driver in
i've tried to start X-Sane, but it doen't find a scanner
Which Umax model did you say it was?
UMAX Astra Scanner 1220P
Hmm right, that should work - ok, it might be a permission thing, it definitely says oyu might need to be root to get to the parallel port
[umax_pp_low]  sanei_umax_pp_InitPort cannot use direct hardware access
Do you have a /dev/parport0 ?
how i can see it?
ls -l /dev/parport0
no such files or directories
Hmm - neither do I - I wonder how we educate ubuntu about parallel ports?
well, i don't know...
Hmm - let me have a dig - unless anyone else knows the magic?
I think the first thing is to get Ubuntu to see parallel por t- until then you aren't going to get very far :-)
okey, how i can make it?
